description:
Makoto finds her old robe and realizes she`s outgrown it, so she decides to make a new one. She also decides to surprise Chinatsu by making her one, too.
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Witch`s Robe and Different Ways to Spend the Day
Majo no Robe to Hibi wa Juunintoiro
À chaque sorcière sa cape et son quotidien
魔女のローブと日々は十人十色
